code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./CreateFolderModal.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateFolderModal=_ref=>{let{closeModal,isLightTheme,onCreateFolder}=_ref;const[folderName,setFolderName]=useState("");const handleCreate=()=>{onCreateFolder(folderName);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay ".concat(isLightTheme?"light":"dark"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-container ".concat(isLightTheme?"light":"dark"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"modal-title",children:"Create New Folder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter folder name",className:"modal-input",value:folderName,onChange:e=>setFolderName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-button done",onClick:handleCreate,children:"Done"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"bar",children:"|"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-button cancel",onClick:closeModal,children:"Cancel"})]})]})});};export default CreateFolderModal;
